idea:
Rushva Parihar is a consultant specializing in corporate social responsibility and sustainability for both the private and public sectors. His work centers on raising awareness and actioning solutions for social and environmental issues. Rushva currently heads YWater India, Improving Lives Foundation, and is the co-founder of First Five Steps, a start-up aiming to help consumers become carbon neutral. 


Rushva has worked closely with various organizations and governing bodies, both within India and globally to champion the cause of climate change. He has served as a representative and member of multiple United Nations programs including the ECOSOC Youth Forum, Youth Assembly, and the Youth Climate Summit. Heâ€™s currently also the Curator of the Global Shapers Mumbai Hub with the World Economic Forum. He is also trained personally by Vice President Al Gore as Climate Reality Leader. 


Previously, Rushva has been a mentor for the Professional Development Program at Brunel University London, a TEDx speaker, and a Sustainable Development Talent at UNLEASH Lab. He is an alum of Brunel University London and the University of Pennsylvania.
name: Rushva Parihar

idea:
Think Big Entertainment is a fast growing initiative by Sultan Productions-makers of fine films, a Production House by the famous Producer and Director of Indian Cinema Late. Mr. Sultan Ahmed.

Think Big Entertainment is a young and dynamic Mumbai based Event Company Involved in Television commercials, Motion Picture Productions, Digital Ad Film and Movie Promotions . The core team is highly experienced, with experiences ranging from Content Writing, Corporate Events, Artist Management, Photo shoots till Product Launches And Promotions.

Our pool of directorial talent is pretty evolved, creating Ad Films and AVs that showcasing stunning visual effects and hard hitting performances.

Our aim is to provide best of resources and inventory at the best cost. We as a team who work together in different talent in hand but with one same vision which is to deliver the best from the rest.
name: THINK BIG ENTERTAINMENT PRIVATE LIMITED
